description:
After losing control over her power, Ton collapses.
Though she finally awakes, drawing too much power from the ring has caused her to lose her memories of Shinyao. Should she reclaim her memories and use her powers to fight for her friend once more, or would it be better for her to give up those memories and live as an ordinary human...? Concerned for Ton`s happiness, the various members of the Twilights express their toughts to Ton.
Meanwhile, Shinyao and Chris continue to flee from Midnight Sun. The Backup, who has been observing them, realizes Shinyao has a strange and mysterious power. When Haysin also expresses interest in her power, the Backup proposes a game.
Source: crunchyroll
